Detailed Description

Atomic locking variable.

Class Locker imlements a locking variable used to secure critical sections of the operating system. It is important to notice that the locking variable used, only shows if a critical section is occupied or free. Waiting for the locking variable and securing the variable has to implemented otherwise.
